  • Method Details

    • findJarEntry

      public static InputStream findJarEntry(String jarPath, String filePath) throws IOException
      find the jar file then the entry for the filePath within it. NOTE: to read the file into a string, can use: 
                  inStream = findJarEntry(...);
            ByteArrayOutputStream out = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
            int c;
            while ((c = inStream.read()) != -1) {
                out.write(c);
            }
            inStream.close();
            String contents = out.toString();
            out.close();
      It is the invoker's responsibility to close the stream.
      Parameters:
      jarPath -
      filePath -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      IOException
